<!--- Global (project-wide) options for 'knitr' --->

```{r KnitrSetupGlobal, cache=FALSE, eval=TRUE, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE, message=TRUE}
if (!suppressMessages(require(knitr))) install.packages('knitr')

PRJ_HOME <- getwd()

opts_knit$set(progress = TRUE, verbose = TRUE)

opts_chunk$set(
  eval = TRUE,
  echo = FALSE,
  include = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = TRUE,
  error = TRUE,
  tidy = FALSE,
  fig.width = '200px',
  fig.height = '200px',
  fig.align = 'center',
  out.width = '0.8\\textwidth',
  fig.path = 'figures/',
  dev = "svg"
)
```
